last_episode_to_air.name: Oslo
last_episode_to_air.overview: The theft of The Scream, one of the world’s most famous paintings, in 1994. The hunt to get it back exposes the depths criminals go to gain a 'get out of jail' card for murder.

name: Stolen: Catching the Art Thieves
overview: The world's greatest paintings - and the most audacious art heists of all time. Gripping true stories of a global game of cat and mouse as high culture meets the underworld.

episodes.name: Frankfurt
episodes.overview: The astonishing story of the theft of two Turners on loan from the Tate in 1994 sparking a high-stakes international hunt across Europe from London to Belgrade, deep into the world of Serbian war lords.

episodes.name: Stockholm
episodes.overview: This episode looks at the theft of a self-portrait of Rembrandt in a brutal robbery in Stockholm and hears from the investigators leading a complex hunt from Russian organised crime to America. The investigation takes a surprising twist involving charismatic FBI agents operating in Hollywood.

episodes.name: Oslo
episodes.overview: The theft of The Scream, one of the world’s most famous paintings, in 1994. The hunt to get it back exposes the depths criminals go to gain a 'get out of jail' card for murder.
